ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Kunark is here! Are lizards better?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry forgot to mention the 20 points available (I think human monks have it too?) ... From: Bennett, Brian [mailto:brian.bennett@agg.com] Sent: Monday, April
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry forgot to mention the 20 points available (I think human monks have it
too?)

-----Original Message-----
From: Bennett, Brian [mailto:brian.bennett@...]
Sent: Monday, April 24, 2000 11:23 AM
To: 'EQ-Monks@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Kunark is here! Are lizards better?


Seems they have 100 Agil, 95 Dex, 80 Stam and 80 Str, and lower Int and Wis
and Cha (non-vitals)

Natural Regen a la Trolls
Infra(?) vision
Evil

-----Original Message-----
From: czubakaj@... [mailto:czubakaj@...]
Sent: Monday, April 24, 2000 11:16 AM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Kunark is here! Are lizards better?


HI, its me again. i want to let you all know that my guild was
approved in record time and I am now in controll of a Monk Only guild
called "Stonefist Warriors". it's cool, but I was wondering if anyne
out there has any info about Iskar and especialy if they are
different from human monks (aside from the tail). let me know if you
got info.

Fell
Stonfist Warriors guild master
